document_data.name: Protection From All Lycanthropes, 10' Radius
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from all lycanthropes, 10' radius''''' was a [[spell]] that protected the recipient from all types of [[lycanthrope]].
document_data.Effects: This spell protected the caster or another individual from all types of lycanthrope. Lycanthropes were unable to get within {{SI|10|ft}} of the recipient.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], namely [[wolfsbane]]. During casting, the wolfsbane was crushed and then cast in a circle around the caster.
document_data.Notable Users:
* [[Ahmad (Semphari)|Ahmad]], a [[Semphari]] [[fighter]], carried a ''scroll of protection from lycanthropes''.
* [[Radatha]], leader of the [[Fire Knives]], kept a ''scroll of protection from lycanthropes'' within her treasure vault.
